resources.string: Data Usage Tracking App by UCT
You have won the lucky draw! Tap here to claim!

Congratulations! You have won our lucky draw! Click a screenshot of this screen and email it to 
 %1$s


Your device ID is 
%2$s

This app runs as a background service and collects the data transmitted/received by a selected list of apps. This data is anonymyzed and sent to a server for storage and analysis. The experimenter can control the start and end of data collection using REST APIs. For a given time interval, the data for all apps is collected and sent to the server.
